resources.string: 5. Restoration of displaced bones or organs by manual pressure alone (5)
6. Fluid which circulates in the vascular system of a plant (3)

Fill in the grid using the clues given in the \'Clue List\'. The \'Clue List\' is located in the menu on the top-right corner of the screen, when you begin a new game. The \'Clue List\' displays the list of Across and Down clues. Press \'Back\' to get back to the main crossword grid.
Use \'Check List\' to find out how you are progressing. It also helps you find out where you have gone wrong.

If you are really stuck - use \'Reveal Letter\' or \'Reveal Word\' If you have gnashed mightily and have submitted to your frustration, then click on \'Reveal Whole Puzzle\'. Just to make it more competitive, the points system is included. For every \'Reveal\' option used, you will lose points accordingly(-1 for \'Reveal Letter\', -5 for \'Reveal Word\' and if you use \'Reveal Whole puzzle\' option, your points would become zero). Just remember, we are not out there to make it easy for you guys!

You can also use the \'Show Hint\' option located in the menu, which displays a hint(an adiitional clue) regarding the clue on which you are stuck. The total number of hints available for a particular crossword depends upon the difficulty level selected. However, this would also result in points deduction - you lose 1 point every time you use the \'Show Hint\' option.
\'Clear Puzzle\' in the menu clears the whole puzzle, so you can start afresh. Your points would be reset back to 0 and hints would be available for you to use.
You can also save your answers and points using the \'Save Game\' option located in the menu. You can then load your saved game from the \'Play Crossword\' menu to resume your previously saved game.

We also have a number and word puzzle game where you will be provided with clues and you have to guess the right number or word. You can use the \'Check\' option to check your answers. No points system is included here. So just sit back, relax and play this game.
Q: The clues are too easy. Why don\'t you make them harder?
If you were able to solve our \'Elite\' level crosswords, then well you are a genius. You can then try the number/word puzzles.
Q: The crossword won\'t expand to full screen. Why is that so?
Well this unfortunately is a limitation of grid layout in android. We hope to rectify this issue in our next release.
Q: I found a mistake. How do I let you know?

Yes, we do make mistakes, but we really appreciate being told, because it improves the puzzles for the next release. You can mail us at abhi.iyer03@gmail.com and tell us about any mistakes you found or any improvements you think should be made in the app.
This application was designed and developed by two MSC-CA students from SICSR, Pune. All the app data and design is their copyright and may not be used in any other product without their permission.
